column1:
<compatible-screens>
        <!-- all small size screens -->
        <screen
            android:screenDensity=""ldpi""
            android:screenSize=""small"" />
        <screen
            android:screenDensity=""mdpi""
            android:screenSize=""small"" />
        <screen
            android:screenDensity=""hdpi""
            android:screenSize=""small"" />
        <screen
            android:screenDensity=""xhdpi""
            android:screenSize=""small"" />
        <!-- all normal size screens -->
        <screen
            android:screenDensity=""ldpi""
            android:screenSize=""normal"" />
        <screen
            android:screenDensity=""mdpi""
            android:screenSize=""normal"" />
        <screen
            android:screenDensity=""hdpi""
            android:screenSize=""normal"" />
        <screen
            android:screenDensity=""xhdpi""
            android:screenSize=""normal"" />
    </compatible-screens>
